items.content_html: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.
items.title: colddsam/Fake-News-Detection: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.
